title: Rg = Land Rate in Rs
clause_text: Rg = Land Rate in Rs. per sq. m as per the Annual Schedule of Rates (herein after referred to as “ASR") of generating plot in the year when project is sanctioned IOD/IOA is issued.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Rg = Land Rate in Rs. per sq. m as per the Annual Schedule of Rates (herein after referred to as “ASR") of generating plot in the year when project is sanctioned IOD/IOA is issued.
